title: Bookkeeper
job_overview:
Schedule Days & Time:
Monday- Friday
8am - 5PM Pacific Standard Time with 1 hour unpaid lunch and two paid 15 min breaks

Qualifications:
- Minimum 1 year of bookkeeping experience
- Excellent English, written and verbal

Responsibilities:
- Check accounting records for accuracy
- Track invoices and payments
- Maintain a system for organizing company documents
- Prepare necessary documentation for CPA and taxes
- May include payroll and insurance renewal

Must Apply Through The Link Upgrade to see actual info
